verses.verse: The plans <S%H4633><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%> belong to man <S%H120><s%>; But the answer <S%H4617><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%> is from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
All the ways <S%H1870><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> are clean <S%H2134><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>; But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> weigheth <S%H8505><s%> the spirits <S%H7307><s%>.
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy works <S%H4639><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, And thy purposes <S%H4284><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H6466><s%> everything for its own end <S%H4617><s%>; Yea <S%H7563><s%>, even the wicked for the day <S%H3117><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>.

Every one that is proud <S%H1362><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Though hand <S%H3027><s%> join in hand <S%H3027><s%>, he shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%>.

By mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is atoned <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H3374><s%>; And by the fear of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> men depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>.
When a man <S%H376><s%>'s ways <S%H1870><s%> please <S%H7521><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, He maketh even his enemies <S%H341><s%> to be at peace with him <S%H7999><s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a little <S%H4592><s%>, with righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, Than great <S%H7230><s%> revenues <S%H8393><s%> with injustice <S%H4941><s%>.
A man <S%H120><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> deviseth <S%H2803><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>; But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> directeth <S%H3559><s%> his steps <S%H6806><s%>.
A divine sentence <S%H7081><s%> is in the lips <S%H8193><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>; His mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall not transgress in judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
A just <S%H4941><s%> balance <S%H3976><s%> and scales <S%H6425><s%> are Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s; All the weights <S%H68><s%> of the bag <S%H3599><s%> are his work <S%H4639><s%>.
It is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to kings <S%H4428><s%> to commit <S%H6213><s%> wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; For the throne <S%H3678><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> by righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
Righteous <S%H6664><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are the delight <S%H7522><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>; And they love <S%H157><s%> him that speaketh <S%H1696><s%> right <S%H3477><s%>.
The wrath <S%H2534><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is as messengers <S%H4397><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>; But a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%> will pacify it <S%H3722><s%>.
In the light <S%H216><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s countenance <S%H6440><s%> is life <S%H2416><s%>; And his favor <S%H7522><s%> is as a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of the latter rain <S%H4456><s%>.

How much better <S%H2896><s%> is it to get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than gold <S%H2742><s%>! Yea <S%H7069><s%>, to get understanding <S%H998><s%> is rather to be chosen <S%H977><s%> than silver <S%H3701><s%>.

The highway <S%H4546><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> is to depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>: He that keepeth <S%H5341><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> preserveth <S%H8104><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Pride <S%H1347><s%> goeth before <S%H6440><s%> destruction <S%H7667><s%>, And a haughty <S%H1363><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a fall <S%H3783><s%>.
Better <S%H2896><s%> it is to be of a lowly <S%H6035><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with the poor <S%H8217><s%>, Than to divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> with the proud <S%H1343><s%>.
He that giveth heed <S%H7919><s%> unto the word <S%H1697><s%> shall find <S%H4672><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>; And whoso trusteth <S%H982><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, happy is he <S%H835><s%>.

The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> prudent <S%H995><s%>; And the sweetness <S%H4986><s%> of the lips <S%H8193><s%> increaseth <S%H3254><s%> learning <S%H3948><s%>.

Understanding <S%H7922><s%> is a well-spring <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> unto him that hath <S%H1167><s%> it <S%H4148><s%>; But the correction of fools <S%H191><s%> is their folly <S%H200><s%>.
The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> instructeth <S%H7919><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, And addeth <S%H3254><s%> learning <S%H3948><s%> to his lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Pleasant <S%H5278><s%> words <S%H561><s%> are as a honeycomb <S%H6688><s%>, Sweet <S%H4966><s%> to the soul <S%H5315><s%>, and health <S%H4832><s%> to the bones <S%H6106><s%>.
There is <S%H3426><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> which seemeth right <S%H3477><s%> unto <S%H6440><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>, But the end <S%H319><s%> thereof are the ways <S%H1870><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.
The appetite of the laboring <S%H6001><s%> man <S%H5315><s%> laboreth <S%H6001><s%> for him <S%H6310><s%>; For his mouth urgeth him thereto <S%H404><s%>.
A worthless <S%H1100><s%> man <S%H376><s%> deviseth <S%H3738><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%>; And in his lips <S%H8193><s%> there is as a scorching <S%H6867><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>.
A perverse <S%H8419><s%> man <S%H376><s%> scattereth <S%H7971><s%> abroad strife <S%H4066><s%>; And a whisperer <S%H5372><s%> separateth <S%H6504><s%> chief friends <S%H441><s%>.
A man <S%H376><s%> of violence <S%H2555><s%> enticeth <S%H6601><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, And leadeth <S%H3212><s%> him in a way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good <S%H2896><s%>.

He that shutteth <S%H6095><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, it is to devise <S%H2803><s%> perverse things <S%H8419><s%>: He that compresseth <S%H7169><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> bringeth <S%H3615><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to pass <S%H3615><s%>.
The hoary head <S%H7872><s%> is a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory <S%H8597><s%>; It shall be found <S%H4672><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

He that is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than the mighty <S%H1368><s%>; And he that ruleth <S%H4910><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%>, than he that taketh <S%H3920><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>.
The lot <S%H1486><s%> is cast <S%H2904><s%> into the lap <S%H2436><s%>; But the whole disposing <S%H4941><s%> thereof is of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
